sentences.sContent: He explained scientifically the most important questions of political economy.
sentences.sContent_eng: He explained scientifically the most important questions of political economy.
sentences.sCn: 他科学地阐述了政治经济学中一些最重要的问题。

sentences.sContent: The object of this society is to perfect its members practically and scientifically.
sentences.sContent_eng: The object of this society is to perfect its members practically and scientifically.
sentences.sCn: 这个社团的目的是实际地、科学地及充分地指导其成员。

synos.tran: 系统地；合乎科学地；学问上
